title: 3dANOVA3
description: Performs three-factor ANOVA on 3D data sets.

type.title: ANOVA Model Type
type.description: Type of ANOVA model to be used. k = 1: A,B,C fixed; AxBxC, k = 2: A,B,C random; AxBxC, k = 3: A fixed; B,C random; AxBxC, k = 4: A,B fixed; C random; AxBxC, k = 5: A,B fixed; C random; AxB,BxC,C(A)

alevels.title: Factor A Levels
alevels.description: Number of levels for factor A.

blevels.title: Factor B Levels
blevels.description: Number of levels for factor B.

clevels.title: Factor C Levels
clevels.description: Number of levels for factor C.

dsets.title: Datasets
dsets.description: Input data sets for specific levels of factors A, B, and C.

voxel_num.title: Voxel Number
voxel_num.description: Screen output for specified voxel number.

diskspace.title: Disk Space
diskspace.description: Print out disk space required for program execution.

mask.title: Mask Dataset
mask.description: Use sub-brick #0 of dataset to define which voxels to process.

outfile_fa.title: Output File A
outfile_fa.description: Specify the output file for the main ANOVA result.

outfile_fb.title: Output File B
outfile_fb.description: Specify the output file for the main B ANOVA result.

outfile_fc.title: Output File C
outfile_fc.description: Specify the output file for the main C ANOVA result.

outfile_fab.title: Output File AB
outfile_fab.description: Specify the output file for the interaction between A and B.

outfile_fac.title: Output File AC
outfile_fac.description: Specify the output file for the interaction between A and C.

outfile_fbc.title: Output File BC
outfile_fbc.description: Specify the output file for the interaction between B and C.

outfile_fabc.title: Output File ABC
outfile_fabc.description: Specify the output file for the interaction between A, B, and C.

outfile_amean.title: Output File A Mean
outfile_amean.description: Specify the output file for the A mean results.

outfile_bmean.title: Output File B Mean
outfile_bmean.description: Specify the output file for the B mean results.

outfile_cmean.title: Output File C Mean
outfile_cmean.description: Specify the output file for the C mean results.

outfile_xmean.title: Output File Overall Mean
outfile_xmean.description: Specify the output file for the overall mean results.

outfile_adiff.title: Output File A Difference
outfile_adiff.description: Specify the output file for the A difference results.

outfile_bdiff.title: Output File B Difference
outfile_bdiff.description: Specify the output file for the B difference results.

outfile_cdiff.title: Output File C Difference
outfile_cdiff.description: Specify the output file for the C difference results.

outfile_xdiff.title: Output File Overall Difference
outfile_xdiff.description: Specify the output file for the overall difference results.

outfile_acontr.title: Output File A Contrast
outfile_acontr.description: Specify the output file for the A contrast results.

outfile_bcontr.title: Output File B Contrast
outfile_bcontr.description: Specify the output file for the B contrast results.

outfile_ccontr.title: Output File C Contrast
outfile_ccontr.description: Specify the output file for the C contrast results.

outfile_abcontr.title: Output File A and B Contrast
outfile_abcontr.description: Specify the output file for the interaction contrast results between A and B.

outfile_Abcontr.title: Output File A and b Contrast
outfile_Abcontr.description: Specify the output file for the interaction contrast results between A and B (case-sensitive).

anyOf.description: Specify the output file for the interaction contrast results between A and B.

outfile_abcontr.description: Specify the output file for the interaction contrast results between A and B.

outfile_abdiff.title: Output File A and B Difference
outfile_abdiff.description: Specify the output file for the interaction difference results between A and B.

outfile_Abdiff.title: Output File A and b Difference
outfile_Abdiff.description: Specify the output file for the interaction difference results between A and B (case-sensitive).

anyOf.description: Specify the output file for the interaction contrast results between A and B.

outfile_abdiff.description: Specify the output file for the interaction contrast results between A and B.

outfile_abmean.title: Output File AB Mean
outfile_abmean.description: Specify the output file for the mean results of the interaction between A and B.

outfile_bucket.title: Output File Bucket
outfile_bucket.description: Specify the output file for the bucket (combined) results.
